title: Fan Fiction: The Audience Writes Back
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Fan Fiction: The Audience Writes Back.

hook.text: Star Trek fans wrote stories about Kirk and Spock in the 1960s. Fan fiction was born â€” and it never stopped.

buildup.text: Fan fiction lets readers rewrite, extend, and reimagine their favorite stories and characters.

discovery.text: Platforms like Archive of Our Own host over 11 million fan works across thousands of fandoms.

twist.text: Fifty Shades of Grey started as Twilight fan fiction. The amateur-to-bestseller pipeline is real.
